mapper.insert:
insert into
( v_elevator_id ,v_elevator_code, i_province_id, i_city_id, i_area_id, v_address, i_elevator_type, i_elevator_use_type, i_elevator_place_type, v_elevator_brand_id, i_maintain_days, d_last_maintain_date, d_next_maintain_date, d_last_inspect_date, d_next_inspect_date, v_maintain_company_id, v_property_company_id, i_government_id, v_maintain_person_name, v_maintain_person_tel, v_emergency_person_name, v_emergency_person_tel, v_http_pt_codes, v_longitude, v_latitude, i_coordinate_type, v_project_id, v_village_id, i_install_status, dt_install_time, i_on_line, i_mode_status, i_fault_status, i_max_floor, i_min_floor, v_floor_detail, v_floor_setting_status, dc_speed, bi_run_count, bi_door_count, bi_bend_count, bi_level_trigger_count, bi_run_distance_count, i_dt, i_dt1, i_dt2, i_nps, i_npr, dc_ndaj, i_angle, i_angle_type, v_sgln_code, v_unit_code, v_leave_factory_number, v_manufacturer_code, v_equipment_code, equ_code, identification_number, v_registration_authority, v_registration_mechanism, v_registration_certificate_no, dt_create_time, dt_modify_time, v_create_user_id, v_modify_user_id, i_del_flag, i_pm_status, night_watch_status, night_watch_start_time, night_watch_end_time) values
(#{item.vElevatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.vElevatorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.iProvinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.iCityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.iAreaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.vAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.iElevatorType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.iElevatorUseType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.iElevatorPlaceType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.vElevatorBrandId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.iMaintainDays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.dLastMaintainDate,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{item.dNextMaintainDate,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{item.dLastInspectDate,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{item.dNextInspectDate,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{item.vMaintainCompanyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.vPropertyCompanyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.iGovernmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.vMaintainPersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.vMaintainPersonTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.vEmergencyPersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.vEmergencyPersonTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.vHttpPtCodes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.vLongitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.vLatitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.iCoordinateType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.vProjectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.vVillageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.iInstallStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.dtInstallTime,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{item.iOnLine,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.iModeStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.iFaultStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.iMaxFloor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.iMinFloor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.vFloorDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.vFloorSettingStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dcSpeed,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.biRunCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.biDoorCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.biBendCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.biLevelTriggerCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.biRunDistanceCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.iDt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.iDt1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.iDt2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.iNps,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.iNpr,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.dcNdaj,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.iAngle,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.iAngleType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.vSglnCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.vUnitCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.vLeaveFactoryNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.vManufacturerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.vEquipmentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.equCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.identificationNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.vRegistrationAuthority,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.vRegistrationMechanism,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.vRegistrationCertificateNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dtCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.dtModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.vCreateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.vModifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.iDelFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.iPmStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{item.nightWatchStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.nightWatchStartTime}, #{item.nightWatchEndTime} )

insert into
(v_elevator_id ,v_elevator_code, v_elevator_name, v_project_id, v_village_id, v_address, v_equipment_code, equ_code, identification_number, dt_create_time, dt_modify_time, v_create_user_id, v_modify_user_id, i_del_flag) values
(#{item.vElevatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.vElevatorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.vElevatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.vProjectId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.vVillageId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.vAddress, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.vEquipmentCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.equCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.identificationNumber, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dtCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.dtModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.vCreateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.vModifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.iDelFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update tbl_elevator set i_fault_status = 0 where i_fault_status = 1
mapper.select: select count(v_elevator_id) from

select ifnull(count(1), 0) as count, i_pm_status as pmStatus, case when i_pm_status = 1 then "待现勘" when i_pm_status = 2 then "待配货" when i_pm_status = 3 then "待安装" when i_pm_status = 4 then "待调测" when i_pm_status = 5 then "待验收" when i_pm_status = 6 then "运行中" when i_pm_status = 7 then "托管" when i_pm_status = 11 then "现勘中" when i_pm_status = 12 then "配货中" when i_pm_status = 13 then "安装中" when i_pm_status = 14 then "调测中" when i_pm_status = 15 then "验收中" else "待现勘" end as pmStatusName from
where v_village_id = #{vVillageId} and i_del_flag = 0 group by pmStatus

select project.v_project_name as vProjectName, village.v_village_name as vVillageName, dept.v_dept_name as vDeptName, elevator.v_elevator_name as vElevatorName, elevator.v_address as vAddress, elevator.v_equipment_code as vEquipmentCode, brand.v_elevator_brand_name as vElevatorBrandName from tbl_elevator as elevator left join tbl_elevator_brand brand on brand.v_elevator_brand_id = elevator.v_elevator_brand_id left join tbl_project as project on elevator.v_project_id = project.v_project_id left join tbl_village as village on elevator.v_village_id = village.v_village_id left join tbl_sys_dept as dept on project.v_dept_id = dept.v_dept_id where elevator.v_elevator_id = #{elevatorId} and elevator.i_del_flag = 0

select v_project_id as projectId, count(*) as total from
where i_install_status in (1, 3) and i_del_flag = 0 group by v_project_id

select v_project_id as projectId, count(*) as total from
where i_install_status in (1, 3) and i_del_flag = 0 and i_on_line = 0 group by v_project_id

select v_elevator_id from
where v_project_id = #{projectId} and i_del_flag = 0 and i_install_status in (1, 3)

select v_elevator_id from
where i_del_flag = 0 and i_install_status in (1, 3)
and v_village_id in
#{villageId}

select v_elevator_id from
where i_del_flag = 0 and i_install_status in (1, 3)
and v_project_id in
#{projectId}
